mapper.select: SELECT MEPASSWORD AS mePw FROM kmasters.ME WHERE MECODE = #{meCode}

SELECT sfEMAIL, SFPASSWORD FROM kmasters.sf where sfemail = #{sfEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE kmasters.me SET MEPASSWORD = #{sfPw} WHERE meemail = #{sfEmail}
UPDATE kmasters.sf SET sfPASSWORD = #{sfPw} WHERE sfemail = #{sfEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT CTCODE, CTNAME,MECODE, MENAME, MEGENDER ,palpcacode as caCode, caname from kmasters.pa INNER JOIN KMASTERS.CT ON ctCODE = palpCTCODE INNER JOIN KMASTERS.ca ON caCODE= palpcacode INNER JOIN KMASTERS.ME ON paMECODE= MECODE WHERE MECODE= #{meCode} and caCODE= palpcacode ORDER BY ctcode asc

select ctcode as ctcode, ctname as ctName, sfcode as sfId, sfname as sfName, sfRank as sfRank, CANAME as sfRankName from kmasters.sf inner join kmasters.ct on sfctcode = ctcode inner join kmasters.ca on cacode = sfrank WHERE sfCTCODE = #{ctCode} AND sfCode = #{sfId}

select idibcode as ibcode ,dacode as ibdacode, idcount from kmasters.id inner join kmasters.da on dacode = iddacode where SUBSTR(idibcode, 1,5) = #{meCode} and (select max(idibcode) from kmasters.id) = kmasters.id.idibcode AND ( dacode = 10000 OR dacode = 10002 OR dacode = 10003 ) order by dacode asc
select ctcode, ctname from kmasters.pa inner join kmasters.ct on palpctcode = ctcode where pamecode = #{meCode} group by ctcode, ctname

select lssfctcode as ctCode,ctname, lssfcode as sfCode ,sfname, lscode ,lsname,lsopen,substr(lsprogress,1,8)as lsDay ,substr(lsprogress,9)as lsTime,lsmecount from kmasters.ls inner join kmasters.sf on lssfctcode = sfctcode and lssfcode = sfcode inner join kmasters.ct on lssfctcode = sfctcode and sfctcode = ctcode where lssfctcode =#{ctCode} and sfname = #{meBirth} or lssfctcode =#{ctCode} and lsname = #{meBirth}

select lssfctcode as ctCode,ctname, lssfcode as sfCode ,sfname, lscode ,lsname,lsopen,substr(lsprogress,1,8)as lsDay ,substr(lsprogress,9)as lsTime, lsmecount as lsMeCount from kmasters.ls inner join kmasters.sf on lssfctcode = sfctcode and lssfcode = sfcode inner join kmasters.ct on lssfctcode = ctcode where substr(lsopen,1,8) = to_date(#{meCode},'YYYYMMDD')
select COUNT(*) from kmasters.re where RELSCTCODE = #{ctCode} AND RELSSFCODE =#{sfCode} AND RELSCODE = #{lsCode} AND RESTCODE = 'R2'
